name: VAT (MTD) end-to-end service guide
description: This testing guide helps to check your software is compatible with APIs to submit VAT returns.

name: Income Tax (MTD) end-to-end service guide
description: This service guide explains HMRC's Making Tax Digital (MTD) for Income Tax, including how to connect software to MTD APIs.

name: Self Assessment end-to-end service guide
description: This guide explains how you can integrate your software with our APIs to help complete and submit Self Assessment returns. It shows how the APIs fit into various end-to-end user journeys.

name: Safety and security import declarations service guide
description: This guide explains how to use Safety and Security (S&S GB) APIs with your software to submit an Entry Summary Declaration to import food into Great Britain.

name: CTC Traders phase 4 service guide
description: This service guide explains how to use the Phase 4 Common Transit Convention (CTC) API.

name: CTC Traders phase 4 testing guide
description: This testing guide helps to check your software is compatible with the Common Transit Convention (CTC) Traders API.

name: CTC Traders phase 5 service guide
description: This service guide explains how to use the Phase 5 Common Transit Convention (CTC) API.

name: CTC Traders phase 5 testing guide
description: This testing guide helps to check your software is compatible with the Common Transit Convention (CTC) Traders API.

name: CTC Traders phase 5 technical interface specification
description: This document explains the processes involved in the message exchange between traders and the New Computerised Transit System (NCTS) at departure and arrival of transit movements.

name: Goods Vehicle Movements service guide
description: This guide explains how to use the Goods Vehicle Movement Service (GVMS) APIs with your software.

name: Customs Declarations end-to-end service guide
description: This guide explains how to integrate your software with our APIs to complete a customs declaration including various end-to-end user journeys.

name: Interest Restriction Return (IRR) service guide
description: This guide explains how to use the Interest Restriction Return (IRR) API with your software. It is for all roles involved in creating or integrating software connected to this API.

name: CTC Guarantee Balance phase 4 service guide
description: This Phase 4 guide explains how to use the Common Transit Convention (CTC) Traders Guarantee Balance API with your software.

name: CTC Guarantee Balance phase 4 testing guide
description: This Phase 4 testing guide helps to check your software is compatible with the Common Transit Convention (CTC) Guarantee Balance API.

name: CTC Guarantee Balance phase 5 service guide
description: This Phase 5 guide explains how to use the Common Transit Convention (CTC) Traders Guarantee Balance API with your software.

name: CTC Guarantee Balance phase 5 testing guide
description: This Phase 5 testing guide helps to check your software is compatible with the Common Transit Convention (CTC) Guarantee Balance API.

name: Import Control System 2 Presentation of Goods service guide
description: This guide explains how to integrate your software to submit a presentation of goods notification to, and receive a control notification from, HMRC.

name: Excise Movement Control System service guide
description: The Excise Movement Control System (EMCS) API is used to submit movement information to the EMCS system, and retrieve information about movements. This guide explains how to use EMCS with your software.

name: Excise Movement Control System testing guide
description: This guide explains how to test your software’s compatibility with the Excise Movement Control System (EMCS) API.

name: Excise Movement Control System technical interface specification
description: This document explains the processes involved in exchanging messages between traders and the Excise Movement and Control System (EMCS). It provides definitions, explains formats and validations.

name: Post and Parcels Service Guide
description: This guide explains how to integrate HMRC’s Secure Data Exchange Service (SDES) with your software, key for sharing information about parcel movements to Northern Ireland.

name: Trader Goods Profile Service Guide
description: For traders registered to move goods from Great Britain to Northern Ireland, but not within the European Union. This API creates updated, removes and gets Traders Good Profile (TGP), request advice and maintaining profiles.

name: Notification of Presentation Waiver Checker Service Guide
description: Learn how, as a Community System Provider (CSP), to use the Notification of Presentation (NOP) waiver checker API.
